|**Known Issues**
|DLSS FG doesn't provide a HUDless resource, so using Nukem's `dlssg-to-fsr3` mod will result in HUD ghosting, but Optiscaler FG and HUDfix works fine

|**Notes**
|Fakenvapi AL2 injection worked fine (version 1.1)

|**Reported By**
|TheRazerMD
